edu.xtec.jclic

Class PlayerHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.PlayerHistory

  • public class PlayerHistory
extends Object
    PlayerHistory uses a Stack object to store the list of projects and activities done by the user. This class allows Player objects to rewind a sequence or go back to a caller menu.
    Version:
    13.09.10
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  PlayerHistory.HistoryElement
      PlayerHistory uses this inner class to store history elements.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Player player
      The Player this PlayerHistory belongs to
      protected Stack<PlayerHistory.HistoryElement> sequenceStack
      This is the main member of the class.
      protected boolean testMode
      When in test mode (for instance, in the Player used by JClic author to preview activities), jumps are only simulated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerHistory(Player player)
      Creates a new PlayerHistory

      Methods

      Processes the provided JumpInfo object, instructing the Player to go back, stop or jump to another point in the sequence.

      Adds the current Player's project and activity to the top of the history stack.

    • Field Detail

      • player

        protected Player player
        The Player this PlayerHistory belongs to

      • sequenceStack

        protected Stack<PlayerHistory.HistoryElement> sequenceStack
        This is the main member of the class. PlayerHistory puts and retrieves on it information about the proects and activities done by the current user.

      • testMode

        protected boolean testMode
        When in test mode (for instance, in the Player used by JClic author to preview activities), jumps are only simulated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerHistory

        public PlayerHistory(Player player)
        Creates a new PlayerHistory
        Parameters:
        player - The Player this PlayerHistory belongs to

    • Method Detail

      • storedElementsCount

        public int storedElementsCount()
        Counts the number of history elements stored in the stack
        Returns:
        The number of stored elements

      • clearHistory

        public void clearHistory()
        Removes all the elements from the history stack

      • push

        public void push()
        Adds the current Player's project and activity to the top of the history stack.

      • pop

        public boolean pop()
        Retrieves the history element placed at the top of the stack (if any) and makes the Player to load it. The obtained effect is to "rewind" or "go back", usually to a caller menu or activity.
        Returns:
        The current implementation of this method always returns true.

      • processJump

        public boolean processJump(JumpInfo ji,
                  boolean allowReturn)
        Processes the provided JumpInfo object, instructing the Player to go back, stop or jump to another point in the sequence.
        Parameters:
        ji - The JumpInfo object to be processed
        allowReturn - When this param is true, the jump instructed by the JumpInfo (if any) will be recorded, in order to make possible to go back to the current activity.
        Returns:
        true if the jump can be processed without errors. false otherwise.

      • isTestMode

        public boolean isTestMode()
        Getter for property testMode.
        Returns:
        Value of property testMode.

      • setTestMode

        public void setTestMode(boolean testMode)
        Setter for property testMode.
        Parameters:
        testMode - New value of property testMode.
